display_name: Hypopnea Index (Supine): (Hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or witout arousal) / hour of sleep  from type III home sleep apnea test
description:
Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events. Hypopneas are defined based on American Academy of Sleep Medicine (AASM) Chicago 1999 standard. [Sleep 1999 (PubMed ID:10450601)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10450601)

[Search for all AHI variables consistent with the same clinical guidelines within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/numom2b/variables?search=chicago1999)
